description: Context-aware policy that restricts agent actions based on operational mode

NORMAL.description: Standard operations mode with read-only access
NORMAL.rationale: During normal operations, agents should only monitor systems to prevent accidental changes

EMERGENCY.description: Emergency mode allowing corrective actions but blocking destructive operations
EMERGENCY.rationale: In emergencies, agents can take corrective actions but are strictly prevented from destructive operations that could cause data loss

global_rules.description: Tools that are never allowed regardless of mode
